title: Fragment, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: plain weave foundation.  block-printed: 2 reds, yellow.  Blue applied by brush over yellow.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (selvedge on left): 30.5 x 18.5 cm (12 x 7 5/16 in.)
Repeat H x W: 3 x 2.5 cm (1 3/16 x 1 in.)
description: Small buds facing alternately left and right on a patterned picottage background.

tombstone.epitaph:
